sub_title: Managing transition towards, rather beyond, a Paris proof real estate portfolio.
summary:
Managing the transition to circular economy based business as a responsible professional. Enabling Redevco's Mission 2040 by connecting relevant business partners in sustainability to the development teams, using personal experience in sustainable development for inspiration. Key note speaker on transition to a circular business model. The development of a Cradle to Cradle inspired Morgue showed a sustainable business case is not a challenge at all. 
Circular economy is a shift from possession to logistics. Data is the key to a successful transition - tracking all data enables accurate measurement of progress and assurance on any report. Successfully implementing sustainability in real estate is half the job, a solid data strategy and policy are the foundation for accurate reports on the state of the assets.

treasury_media.title: Embedding Sustainability at Amsterdam Airport Schiphol
treasury_media.description:
Wastebuild edition of 25 March 2021.
I talked about the pilots we did and about the next steps to take to get to maturity. 
We're not there yet, but the seeds we planted the past years are rooted and start to grow. 
Turning policy into practice. Recording: https://www.wastebuild.com/live/en/node/newsarticle-applying-circularity-in-practice-from-wastebuild-365-25-march?type=NewsArticle

treasury_media.title: Webinar Bam Bouw Techniek Schiphol
treasury_media.description: Ondanks Covid-19 blijven de ambities van RSG op duurzaamheid overeind. We investeren minder, maar de eisen waaraan de investeringen moeten voldoen zijn niet veranderd. Door duurzaamheid blijvend in processen en eisen te verankeren, schaalt deze mee op met investeringen als de economie weer aantrekt.

treasury_media.title: was+ebuild365
treasury_media.description: Royal Schiphol Group and Ecor joined forces to develop Ecor panels out of the airport's grass waste stream. The grass is being cleaned, refined to fibers and proteins. The proteins are being used in food industry and the fibers are a resource for Ecor panels. The panels have to comply to very strict fire safety rules in order to be able to use them in the terminal building. This is how we turn a waste stream into a rescource stream with a business case.

treasury_media.title: Spinup Innovation Summit 2020
treasury_media.description: At the Spinup Innovation Summit I shared insights to how a corporate organization as Royal Schiphol Group addresses sustainability, circularity in particular, in policy and how policy is to be connected to the operation.

treasury_media.title: WasteBuild Partnership Approach to Circular Schemes
treasury_media.description: WasteBuild is a live event hosted in Amsterdam focussed exclusively on circular solutions for the construction industry. At the first event in December 2019 I presented a keynote about partnership approach.

treasury_media.title: Cradle to Cradle Café: “Towards no-waste buildings: C2C, Madaster and BAMB" 25 oktober 2018 in Eindhoven
treasury_media.description:
Zero waste luchthaven

“De luchthaven Schiphol heeft uitgesproken in 2030 een zero waste en klimaatneutraal airport te willen zijn,” vertelt Martijn Horsman, spreker twee van vandaag. Daarmee zou Luchthaven Schiphol koploper in de transitie naar de circulaire economie worden.

treasury_media.title: Airport City Mining
treasury_media.description: lectures of New Horizon (Michel Baars) and Triboo (Marc van der Heijden and Martijn Vinke) about the Circular Economy for 300 coworkers of Royal Schiphol Group

treasury_media.title: NH AIRTIME S03E06 (NL) | Nieuw mortuarium op Schiphol
treasury_media.description: TV episode in Dutch. Met zo'n 2500 overledenen die Schiphol jaarlijks passeren, heeft de luchthaven eindelijk het mortuarium dat het verdient.

treasury_media.title: Respect staat centraal bij nieuwe mortuarium op Schiphol - Stedenbouw
treasury_media.description: Op 17 november 2017 is het nieuwe mortuarium aan de Jan Plezierweg op Schiphol geopend. Het oude gebouw aan de Havenmeesterweg moest verdwijnen in verband met de uitbreiding van Schiphol. Het nieuwe pand is volgens het Cradle to Cradle-principe...

treasury_media.title: Nieuw mortuarium voor Schiphol - Cobouw.nl
treasury_media.description: Schiphol krijgt een nieuw mortuarium. Het huidige mortuarium aan de Havenmeesterweg moet verdwijnen vanwege de uitbreiding van Schiphol. Het nieuwe mo...

projects.title: Road map Most Sustainable Airports
projects.description: In order to know what steps to be taken to become a zero waste and zero emissions airport and to contribute to sustainable aviation, We created the road map, a collaboration of Corporate Development and Asset Management with contributions of all the business units within the company. We have had our waste streams examined and tagged them to actions in design specs, pilot projects and tenders. As we did for our energy consumption, fossil fuels and renewable. All actions have been put in time in order to monitor qualitative and quantitative progress. The project was closed by approval of the Royal Schiphol Group board of directors and by the supervisory board.

projects.title: C2C nieuwbouw voor Mortuarium Schiphol
projects.description:
Due to the new Pier development we had to move the morgue. I decided the new building should be developed Cradle to Cradle inspired, in order to create a building with a rather positive footprint. Fitting in the zero waste 2030 goal as committed to by signing a declaration of the Ellen MacArthur Foundation.  In Co-creation with EPEA, Mortuarium Schiphol, Moen en van Oosten architects, Techniplan, Swinn, De Vries Verburg and Royal Schiphol Group stakeholders we delivered a road map to a Cradle to Cradle morgue with respect as common theme. It was built in only 5 months. https://youtu.be/yU5jN8O7j_8 NH AIRTIME | Nieuw mortuarium op Schiphol
http://www.nhnieuws.nl/nieuws/215680/Een-waardige-laatste-reis-vanuit-het-nieuwe-Mortuarium-Schiphol NH nieuws
https://www.cobouw.nl/bouwbreed/bouwbericht/2017/07/nieuw-mortuarium-voor-schiphol-101251025 Cobouw
https://www.duurzaamgebouwd.nl/circulaire-economie/20171124-schiphols-nieuwe-mortuarium-energieneutraal-en-cradle-to-cradle Duurzaam gebouwd
http://www.stedenbouw.nl/respect-staat-centraal-nieuwe-mortuarium-op-schiphol/ Stedenbouw

projects.title: Stadshart Almere, shopping center
projects.description: A massive city development by public (city of Almere) and private (MAB and Blauwhoed-Eurowoningen) containing shops, housing, Cineplex, hotel, pop stage, library and theatre. I was involved with the 36.000 square meters large shopping center, now called the Citadel, with houses on top. A design by Christian de Portzamparc. I was also involved with the realization of the Cineplex, Utopolis.

profile_positions.description: Managing transition towards a circular economy. Bringing the Roadmap Most Sustainable Airports to execution, leading towards zero waste and zero emissions by 2030 and circular and energy positive by 2050.
profile_positions.title: Strategic Sustainability Advisor Asset Management

profile_positions.description: The Task Force Circular Economy consists of 6 managers of different business areas. We are defining the path to a Zer0waste airport. Connecting the mile stones of strategic plan, tactical plan, asset planning and airport development to the Road Map towards a ZeroWaste and ZeroEmission airport in 2030. directing the stages, monitoring progress while delivering the capabilities to execute.
profile_positions.title: Member of Task Force Circular Economy

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the process of initiation, design, engineering, procurement, contracting and realization of real estate projects.
Responsible for the process of programs (MSP)
profile_positions.title: Sr Projectmanager

profile_positions.description:
Amsterdam Airport Schiphol is aiming for ZeroWaste in 2030. The principles of the circular economy are to be incorporated in all business areas. It concerns development of new assets, modifications and management. It’s business, but not as we know it. A different way of designing, procurement and information management is required. I use my expertise in fields of real estate development, project management and technical knowledge in combination with my network promoting the principles of the Circular Economy and more specific Cradle to Cradle to the Schiphol Community by organizing lectures and workshops by experts.
When developing the Amsterdam Airport Morgue we aimed for a maximum Cradle to Cradle Principle based building. Based on my experiences with this project I’m advising on projects, handing tools for road maps and procurement to get the maximum of circularity in every project during this transition to a Zer0Waste Airport.
My personal ambition is to establish positive impact, in stead of minimizing negative footprint. Supporter of Built Positive.
profile_positions.title: Circular Economy Ambassador

profile_positions.description: As a project manager I have been responsible for the process of design, engineering and realization of office buildings as for the exploitation of the central parking facility Mahler4.
profile_positions.title: Projectmanager commercial real estate

profile_positions.description: I have been working as a project manager at several projects, starting as junior, growing to senior. The projects I was involved with contain several office buildings and shopping centers. I experienced all the different stadiums of real estate development.
profile_positions.title: Projectmanager commercial real estate
